name: Starship: Sabotage
description:
A space shooter game with roguelite and bullet-hell elements.

Infiltrate enemy motherships and destroy them from the inside!

In Starship Sabotage, you roam the corridors of enemy ships, destroying the foes you encounter while equipping yourself with powerful weapon system and ship upgrades. With limited fuel, you must act quickly or else become stranded in the clutches of Earth's enemies.

Scan unknown items to know if they will help or hurt you in your mission. Scan probes are limited, so some choices are a gamble.

Multiple types of enemies, bosses, and random encounter await your arrival.

Do you have what it takes to complete your sabotage?

(This game is still very immature. It is under active development.)

For Windows

Linux and Android Builds coming soon.
